title: The Survivalist with Burt Gummer
description: Burt Gummer is a survivalist. He’s scoured the dirt and dust of Nevada and Mexico, putting his life on the line to hunt super-size subterranean man-eating predators called Graboids.
altHero: Burt Gummer looks into the scope of a gun
alt1: Gummer’s silhouette holding a gun in the desert
alt2: Gummer speaks to the camera holding a gun
alt3: a graboid monster emerging from the sand
alt4: Gummer smiling with his gun slung over his shoulder
